channel.title: Comments on: More Geek Seeds
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: I, too saw Lord of the rings and was reading the book at this age. It was seeing Alfred Hitchcock's "the birds" that gave me a lifetime of nightmares. (I always watched whatever my dad was watching on TV).
item.content:encoded: I, too saw Lord of the rings and was reading the book at this age. It was seeing Alfred Hitchcock’s “the birds” that gave me a lifetime of nightmares. (I always watched whatever my dad was watching on TV).
